title: Fix YouTube URL and screenshot fullscreen close

requirements.summary: Update YouTube embed URL to C-Q0-2kiFhs with playsinline and fs=0 parameters
acceptanceCriteria: The iframe embed URL is exactly https://www.youtube.com/embed/C-Q0-2kiFhs?playsinline=1&fs=0&autoplay=1 (or equivalent with those parameters) when the play button is clicked
The old video ID (5in-hIASH08) does not appear anywhere in PressKitPage.tsx
Clicking the thumbnail play button reveals the inline iframe and starts playback
No fullscreen button is shown in the embedded player

file_operations.description: Update the YouTube video ID from '5in-hIASH08' to 'C-Q0-2kiFhs' in the videoId constant. Ensure the iframe src includes query parameters playsinline=1 and fs=0 in addition to autoplay=1. The video thumbnail with play button overlay should remain functional, revealing the inline iframe with the updated URL when clicked.

requirements.summary: Add click handler to screenshot image in fullscreen overlay to close the overlay
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the screenshot image in fullscreen overlay closes the overlay
After closing, the press kit page content is visible and scroll is re-enabled
No previous/next navigation arrows are present in the overlay
Clicking the backdrop (outside the image) also closes the overlay

file_operations.description: Add an onClick handler directly to the element inside the fullscreen screenshot overlay. The handler must call setFullscreenImage(null) and stopPropagation() to prevent the event from bubbling. This ensures clicking the image itself (not just the backdrop) closes the overlay and returns the user to the normal press kit view.
